title: The more I play Urgot, the more I'm beginning to wonder...
body:
**What the fuck is the point of his Q?** It's like a shittier version of Galio's old Q.

Use it for Lock-On? Hell, his E is a lot better to use.
Slow? Frozen Mallet does the job right for me assuming I managed to rack up early gold.
Extra damage? My shotgun passive helps me out a lot smoother.

The only point I see in his Q function is two things:

- interrupt recalls.
- kill unreachable minion cs.
